lines.text: They tell me I sound more like Boyer than Boyer himself.
Would you believe it... I once had to play both ends of a horse!
I play shakespeare in english, french, turkish, arabic...

Oh, fine, she had kittens yesterday. Oh, you mean the Persian language, oh well, i speak that flawlessly well too, you see, I was a rug salesman, traveling out of Afghan... what's all this got to do with Shakespeare?
I must say, one wife is plenty, but two wives is just too much!
You didn't tell me you were married. You should have told me!
Oh, what's a wife between friends?
Nobody can make a fool out of me, except me!

[speaking of his singing]
I could do anything a bird could do.
